dt: {bc}a long-legged African wildcat ({it}Felis serval{/it}) having large ears and a tawny black-spotted coat

et: French, from Portuguese {it}lobo cerval{/it} lynx, from Medieval Latin {it}lupus cervalis{/it}, literally, deerlike wolf
shortdef: a long-legged African wildcat (Felis serval) having large ears and a tawny black-spotted coat
